maqras.text: 18|51|Man ononro [ki musrikona ʙa parastis megired] na hangomi ofarinisi osmonu zamin ʙa guvohi giriftam va na hangomi ofarinisi xudason; va man hargiz gumrohgaronro joru madadgori [xes] nagiriftaam

18|52|Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki Alloh taolo [ʙa musrikon] mefarmojad: «Sarikonero, ki ʙaroi man mepindosted, faro ʙixoned [to sumoro az azoʙ ʙirahonand]; pas, onhoro mexonand, vale posuxasonro namedihand; va Mo dar mijoni in du guruh mahlakae [az otasi duzax] qaror dodaem
18|53|Va gunahgoron otas [-i duzax]-ro meʙinand va ʙa jaqin darmejoʙand, ki dar on xohand aftod va az on co hec rohi ʙozgaste nadorand
18|54|Va ʙa rosti, dar in Qur'on ʙaroi mardum az har guna masale ovardem; va[-le] inson ʙes az har cize ʙa sitez [va cunucaro] mepardozad

18|55|Va cize mardumro ʙoznadost, ki vaqte hidojat [pajomʙar va Qur'on] ʙa sujason omad, imon ʙijovarand va az Parvardigorason omurzis ʙixohand, magar in ki [az rui lacocat mexostand] sunnati [Alloh taolo dar mavridi azoʙi] pesinijon ʙar [sari] onon [niz] ʙijojad jo azoʙi ru dar ru ʙa onon ʙirasad

18|56|Va mo pajomʙaronro cuz ʙasoratgar va ʙimdihanda namefiristem va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, ʙa [suxanoni ʙehuda va] ʙotil siteza mekunand, to ʙa vasilai on haq [Qur'on]-ro pojmol kunand va [mu'cizotu] ojoti man va on ciro, ki ʙa on ʙim doda sudaand, ʙa tamasxur giriftand

18|57|Kist sitamgortar az on ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigoras pand doda savad, vale az on ru ʙigardonad va korhoi [zisti] guzastaasro faromus kunad? Mo ʙar dilhojason pardahoe afkandaem, to [pajomi haq]-ro darnajoʙand va dar gushojason sangini [nihodaem, to suxani haqro nasnavand]; va agar ononro ʙa sui hidojat ʙixoni, hargiz hidojat namesavand

18|58|[Ej Pajomʙar] Parvardigorat omurzanda va doroi rahmat [farovon] ast. Agar onon [kofiron]-ro ʙa [sazoi] on ci kardaand, ʙozxost mekard, hatman, dar azoʙason sitoʙ menamud; [ammo cunin namekunad] ʙalki onon mav'ide dorand, ki hargiz az on gureze naxohand dost
18|59|Mo [sokinoni] on sahrhoro hangome halok namudem, ki [ʙa xotiri kufru gunoh] ʙa xud sitam kardand va ʙaroi halokatason mav'ide ta'jin kardem

18|60|[Jod kun az] Hangome ki Muso ʙa [xidmatkori] cavoni xud [Jusa' iʙni Nun] guft: «Hamcunon xoham raft, to ʙa mahalli ʙarxurdi du darjo ʙirasam jo ʙaroi muddati tuloni roh ʙipajmojam [to ʙandai durustkore ʙijoʙam va nodonistahojamro az u ʙijomuzam]»

18|61|Pas, cun ʙa mahalli ʙarxurdi du darjo rasidand, mohii xudro [ki ʙaroi xurdan hamroh dostand] faromus kardand [pas, Alloh taolo onro zinda kard va ʙa oʙ andoxt] va mohi rohi xudro dar darjo pes girift
18|62|Pas, hangome ki [ʙa roh aftodand va az on co] guzastand, [Muso] ʙa [xidmatkori] cavoni xud guft: «Ƣizojamonro ʙijovar, ki az in safar ʙisjor xasta sudaem»

18|63|[Jusa'] Guft: «Ba jod dori, hangome ki [ʙaroi istirohat] ʙa kanori on taxtasang coj giriftem, man [dar on co dostoni zinda sudani] mohiro faromus kardam [ki ʙo tu ʙigujam] va cuz sajton [kase] maro az jodovarii on [doston] ʙa faromusi naandoxt va mohi ʙa tarze sigiftovar rohasro dar darjo pes girift»
18|64|[Muso] Guft: «On hamon cizest, ki mexostem [va cojgohi on ʙandai nakukor hamon cost]». Pas, custucukunon radi poi xudro giriftand [va az hamon roh] ʙozgastand
18|65|Pas, [dar on co] ʙandae az ʙandagoni mo [Xizr]-ro joftand, ki az coniʙi xes ʙa u rahmate doda ʙudem va az nazdi xud ʙa vaj donise omuxta ʙudem
18|66|Muso ʙa u guft: «Ojo [icozat medihi] hamrohat ʙijojam, to az on ci ʙa tu omuxta suda va mojai hidojatu irsod ast ʙa man ʙijomuzi?»
18|67|[Xizr] Guft: «Tu hargiz nametavoni, [dar itoat va hamrohi] hamrohi man sikeʙoi kuni
18|68|Va ci guna ʙar [ancomi] kore, ki ʙa [rozi] on ogoh nesti, sikeʙoi mekuni?»
18|69|[Muso] Guft: «Insoalloh sikeʙo xoham ʙud va dar hec kore az tu nofarmoni namekunam»
18|70|[Xizr] Guft: «Pas, agar ʙo man hamroh sudi, dar ʙorai hec ciz az man suol nakun, to xud ʙo tu dar ʙoraas suxane ʙigujam»
18|71|Pas, on du ʙa roh aftodand, to on ki savori kisti sudand. [Xizr] Kistiro surox kard. [Muso] guft: «Onro surox kardi, to sarnisinonasro ƣarq kuni? Rosti, ci kori noravoe kardi!»
18|72|[Xizr] Guft: «Ojo naguftam, tu hargiz nametavoni ʙo man sikeʙoi kuni?»
18|73|[Muso] guft: «Ba xotiri on ci faromus kardam, sarzanisam nakun va dar koram ʙar man saxt nagir»

18|74|Pas, ʙa roh aftodand, to hangome ki ʙa navcavone rasidand va [Xizr] uro kust. [Muso] guft: «Saxsi [ʙegunohu] pokero kusti [on ham] ʙiduni in ki kasero kusta ʙosad? Voqean, kori nopisande kardi!»
